name: Support Groups - Peer Counseling Sessions
description: Peer Support Groups offer a safe space to share their experiences with and gain insight from each other.
fullDescription: Peer Support Groups offer a safe space to share their experiences with and gain insight from each other.
whatTheyOffer: Led by trained facilitators, support groups offer a safe space for survivors of domestic violence to share their experiences with and gain insight from each other. In these groups, survivors are invited to explore their feelings, receive and offer support, and gain important tools needed to heal from the effects of violent relationships. Peer Counseling Sessions: Working with a trained DV counselor to discuss next steps, process trauma and get referrals is often a helpful first step in a survivo
howToGetIt: PEER COUNSELING and SUPPORT GROUP (in English): please fill out this registration form in its entirety. Someone will get in touch with you within 7-10 days after receiving your registration with any questions and next steps.
